english.segment1: Heart pounds to the sound comin' after me. Step back. what is that? it's a mystery. Is it somethin'? pro'bly nothin'. Still I find a way to scare myself. 'til I remember this all feels familiar, And I know better.
english.segment2: They are only paper tigers followin' me. In the wild imagination of the make believe, oh. And there's a fighter, a survivor arisin' in me. I'm not afraid of paper tigers.
english.segment3: Night brings creepy things, and I hide away. False fears disappear in the light of day. (light of day). The sun is risin'; I'm realizin'. The only thing to fear is fear itself. Now I am certain that my beast of burden. Isn't worth the worry.
english.segment4: They are only paper tigers followin' me. In the wild imagination of the make believe, oh. And there's a fighter, a survivor arisin' in me. I'm not afraid of paper tigers. oh (paper paper tigers) oh oh (oh oh)
english.segment5: They are only paper tigers followin' me. In the wild imagination of the make believe. And there's a fighter, a survivor arisin' in me. I'm not afraid of paper tigers.
english.segment6: (they are only paper tigers) followin' me yeah. (in the wild imagination) oh, they're only make believe, wow. There's a fighter, a survivor arisin' in me. I'm not afraid, and I won't run away from paper tigers. Ooo ooo
